# append(contentsOf:)

**Instance Method**

Adds anchors from an array to the end of this collection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func append(contentsOf array: [any HasAnchoring])
```

## Parameters

- **array**: The array of anchor entities to add.

## Adding anchors

- **append(_:)**: Adds a new anchor at the end of the collection.
- **append(contentsOf:)**: Adds anchors from a sequence to the end of this collection.
